expertAdvice: Discover our expert advice, market trends and practical recommendations to adjust your career path.
manageProfile: Manage your personal profile, information, and preferences.
configureSettings: Configure your application preferences and settings.
findHelp: Find help and support for using the platform.
appSettingsImplemented: Application settings will be implemented here.
helpCenterImplemented: Help center will be implemented here with documentation and support.
personalSpaceImplemented: Your personal space will be implemented here with profile management and settings.
recommendationSystemImplemented: The job recommendation system will be implemented here with suggestions based on your profile.
testHistoryImplemented: The detailed history of your tests and assessments will be displayed here with results and progress.
improveSkills: Improve your skills through comprehensive practice sessions and track your progress in this skill category.
interactiveAssessments: Interactive assessment and practice exercises will be available here. This skill category assessment is ready to begin.
personalizedJobOffers: Discover personalized job offers based on your profile and skills.
reviewTestHistory: Review the history of all your tests and skill assessments.
adjustSearchCriteria: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
skillsTestsDescription: You will be tested on the skills from your CV
ensureStableConnection: Ensure you have a stable internet connection
noInterruptions: Work in a quiet environment without interruptions
oneAttemptOnly: You have only one attempt per test
question: Question
testDescription: This test has been designed to assess your numerical reasoning ability using the information provided in a series of charts, tables and figures. Look at each chart or table provided for each question, and use the information in these to work out the correct answer. You have 5 options from which to choose from. Only one of these options is the correct answer.
testDuration: This test consists of 20 questions and you have 18 minutes in which to complete this. The questions are numbered across the top of the screen.
skillsTestDescription: Select a test to evaluate your skills and track your progress
assessNumericalSkills: Assess your numerical and analytical skills
numericalTestDesc: This test evaluates your ability to work with numbers, charts, and data analysis.
abstractTestDesc: This test evaluates your ability to identify patterns and logical sequences.
useCalculationsCarefully: Use calculations and work carefully through each problem
lookForPatterns: Look for patterns and logical relationships in visual sequences
useLogicalThinking: Use logical thinking to identify the next element in the pattern
abstractSampleDesc: Look at the pattern and identify what comes next:
patternExplanation: The pattern shows increasing elements - the 4th should continue this sequence
errorStartingTest: Error starting test. Please try again.
selectCorrectOption: Select the correct option that completes the pattern
